I.name: Hemorrhage
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Darius' ''' damaging [[basic attack]]s and [[Champion ability|abilities]] apply a [[stack]] of ''Hemorrhage'' to enemies hit for 5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 5 times.

{{sbc|Hemorrhage:}} For each stack, the target is dealt{{ft|{{as|{{pp|13 to 30}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''total''' physical damage}} over the duration,|{{as|{{pp|3.25 to 7.5}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|7.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|physical damage}} every {{fd|1.25}} seconds over the duration,}}up to a maximum of{{ft|{{as|{{pp|13*5 to 30*5}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 150% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''total''' physical damage}} over the duration.|{{as|{{pp|3.25*5 to 7.5*5}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|37.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|physical damage}} with each tick.}}''Hemorrhage'' deals 300% damage against {{tip|monsters}}.
When '''Darius''' kills a champion with ''{{ai|Noxian Guillotine|Darius}}'', or applies 5 stacks on an enemy {{tip|champion}}, he becomes empowered with ''Noxian Might'' for 5 seconds.

{{sbc|Noxian Might:}} '''Darius''' gains {{pp|30 to 75 for 10;85 to 105 for 3;130 to 230 for 5|formula=30 + 5 per level until level 10, then + 10 per level until level 13, then + 25 per level|color=AD}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}} and instantly applies 5 ''Hemorrhage'' stacks through his usual means.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Darius' damaging basic attacks and Champion ability apply a stack of Hemorrhage to enemies hit for 5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 5 times.

Hemorrhage: For each stack, the target is dealtup to a maximum ofHemorrhage deals 300% damage against monsters.
When Darius kills a champion with Darius's Noxian Guillotine, or applies 5 stacks on an enemy champion, he becomes empowered with Noxian Might for 5 seconds.
Noxian Might: Darius gains 30 − 75 for 10;85 (based on level) bonus attack damage and instantly applies 5 Hemorrhage stacks through his usual means.
I.notes:
* If Hemorrhage's '''total''' {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} damage is higher than the {{as|target's '''current''' health}}, a small area of {{tip|sight}} is granted around the target for the duration of Hemorrhage and for another 2 seconds after it ends.
* ''Hemorrhage'' does not apply to [[structures]] nor {{tip|wards}}.
* '''Darius'''' attacks and abilities have to deal damage to apply ''Hemorrhage''.
** ''Hemorrhage'' cannot be applied to/refreshed against {{tip|invulnerable}} targets.
** ''Hemorrhage'' '''can''' be applied to and refreshed against {{tip|shield|shielded}} targets.
** ''Hemorrhage'' can also be applied {{tip|on-hit}}, but will specifically not do so if the target is invulnerable.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} prevents ''Hemorrhage's'' application from abilities only.

Q.name: Decimate
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Darius''' hefts his axe for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, and then swings it around himself, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies, reduced to 35% against enemies hit by the ''handle''.

Against champions and large monsters, '''Darius''' {{tip|heal|heals}} for {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|changedisplay=true|type=enemies hit by the ''blade''|key=%|13 to 39 for 3|1;2;3+|formula=13%*Enemies hit. ''This is capped at 3 enemies.''}} of his '''missing''' health}}}}. The ''handle'' of '''Darius' ''' axe will not heal him nor apply nor refresh {{ai|Hemorrhage|Darius}}.
'''''Darius''' is unable to declare basic attacks or cast {{ai|Apprehend|Darius}} or {{ai|Noxian Guillotine|Darius}} during Decimate.''
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Darius hefts his axe for 0.75 seconds, and then swings it around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, reduced to 35% against enemies hit by the handle.
Against champions and large monsters, Darius heals for 1;2;3+ ‒ undefined of his missing health. The handle of Darius' axe will not heal him nor apply nor refresh Darius's Hemorrhage.
Darius is unable to declare basic attacks or cast Darius's Apprehend or Darius's Noxian Guillotine during Decimate.
leveling: {{st|Blade Physical Damage|{{ap|50 to 170}} {{as|(+ {{ap|100 to 140}}% AD)}}|Handle Physical Damage|{{ap|50*0.35 to 170*0.35}} {{as|(+ {{ap|100*0.35 to 140*0.35}}% AD)}}}}
Q.notes: * ''Decimate'' will cancel if '''Darius''' enters {{tip|stasis (buff)|stasis}} during the delay.

effects.str:
• Blade Physical Damage: (+ % AD)
  • Handle Physical Damage: (+ % AD)

W.name: Crippling Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Darius' ''' next [[basic attack]] within 4 seconds gains {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' range}}, has an {{tip|uncancellable windup}}, deals modified {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} the target by 90% for 1 second.
If this attack [[kill]]s the target, half of the cooldown is {{sti|ah|reduced}} and the {{as|{{sti|mana cost}}}} is refunded.
''Crippling Strike'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Darius' ''' basic attack timer, and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} with its '''total''' damage.
''The attack's animation can be cancelled by casting {{ai|Decimate|Darius}}, but the attack will still land.''
W.descriptionHtml:
Active: Darius' next basic attack within 4 seconds gains 25 bonus range, has an uncancellable windup, deals modified physical damage and slows the target by 90% for 1 second.
If this attack kills the target, half of the cooldown is reduced and the mana cost is refunded.
Crippling Strike resets Darius' basic attack timer, and can critically strike with its total damage.
The attack's animation can be cancelled by casting Darius's Decimate, but the attack will still land.
W.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not block the damage.
* ''Crippling Strike'' will trigger {{ri|Manaflow Band}}.
* Despite its name, ''Crippling Strike'' does not {{tip|cripple}} anymore.

E.name: Apprehend
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Darius''' sweeps his axe in a cone in the target direction, {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds while {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them towards him. Targets then rebound {{tt|150|Estimated}} units off of '''Darius''', remaining {{tip|airborne}} for a total of 1 second.
'''Darius''' also briefly grants {{tip|sight}} of the area around the pull.
'''''Darius''' is unable to move or cast {{ai|Decimate|Darius}} or {{ai|Noxian Guillotine|Darius}} for {{fd|0.4}} seconds after Apprehend's cast time.''
E.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Darius gains armor penetration.
Active: Darius sweeps his axe in a cone in the target direction, slowing enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds while pulling them towards him. Targets then rebound 150 units off of Darius, remaining airborne for a total of 1 second.
Darius also briefly grants sight of the area around the pull.
Darius is unable to move or cast Darius's Decimate or Darius's Noxian Guillotine for 0.4 seconds after Apprehend's cast time.
E.notes:
* The {{tip|slow}} duration starts as soon as '''Darius''' grabs the target, meaning 50% {{tip|Tenacity}} will leave the target not slowed at all after the {{tip|airborne}} ends.
** This is disregarding stat update timing, which means that the target's movement speed may still be reduced for up-to {{fd|0.25}} seconds after the slow ends.
* Enemies hit by ''Apprehend'' will quickly be dragged to '''Darius''' before rebounding over a longer period.
** {{pending for test}}: The rebound location is determined when the target reaches '''Darius' '''location.
** The rebound's forced movement's duration is roughly {{fd|0.5}} seconds, finishing before the {{tip|airborne}} duration ends.
** {{pending for test}}: There is no {{tip|stun}} applied for the same duration of the {{tip|airborne}}, meaning {{tip|brittle}} cannot extend the disable duration. It will, however, increase the {{tip|slow}} duration.
* After the pull, '''Darius''' will attempt to basic attack the closest pulled target.
* The armor penetration {{tip|stacks multiplicatively}} with other forms of [[Armor_penetration#Percentage_armor_penetration|percentage armor penetration]].
{{Effect at cast time end}}
{{ct|cast|spells=true,false,false,false,false}}

R.name: Noxian Guillotine
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Darius''' attempts to execute the target enemy {{tip|champion}}, {{tip|lunge|leaping}} towards them to deal them {{sti|{{as|true damage}}}}, increased by {{pp|type=[[File:Hemorrhage.png|20px]] Hemorrhage stacks|key=%|0 to 100 by 20|0 to 5}}, and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area around them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds from the start of the cast time.

If the target dies within {{fd|0.15}} seconds after being hit by ''Noxian Guillotine'', '''Darius''' {{tip|fear|fears}} nearby {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}} for 3 seconds, during which they are gradually {{tip|slow|slowed}} by up to 99% over the duration, and is able to recast the ability within 20 seconds at no cost, which refreshes on further executions.
At rank 3, ''Noxian Guillotine'' has no {{sti|{{as|mana cost}}}} and recast timer.
'''''Darius''' is unable to cast {{ai|Decimate|Darius}} or {{ai|Apprehend|Darius}} for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after Noxian Guillotine's cast time.''
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Darius attempts to execute the target enemy champion, leaping towards them to deal them true damage, increased by 0 to 5 ‒ undefined, and granting sight of the area around them for 2.5 seconds from the start of the cast time.
If the target dies within 0.15 seconds after being hit by Noxian Guillotine, Darius fears nearby minions and monsters for 3 seconds, during which they are gradually slowed by up to 99% over the duration, and is able to recast the ability within 20 seconds at no cost, which refreshes on further executions.
At rank 3, Noxian Guillotine has no mana cost and recast timer.
Darius is unable to cast Darius's Decimate or Darius's Apprehend for 0.25 seconds after Noxian Guillotine's cast time.
leveling: {{st|True Damage|{{ap|125 to 375}} {{as|(+ 75% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Bonus Damage Per Stack|{{ap|125*0.2 to 375*0.2}} {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum True Damage|{{ap|125*2 to 375*2}} {{as|(+ 150% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
R.notes:
* ''Noxian Guillotine's'' cooldown after the recast or recast window is calculated by taking the values at the end, and using this formula: (''Noxian Guillotine's'' Cooldown - time since first cast){{times}}(1 - {{sti|cdr}}).
* ''Noxian Guillotine'' applies {{ai|Hemorrhage|Darius}} after the damage.
* '''Darius''' will only leap towards the target if it is at range, or leap backwards if it is very close.
** This leap can pass very thin terrain and will otherwise not be able to. In any case, '''Darius''' will still hit the target.
** The ability is disabled while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}} even if '''Darius''' is in the range in which he does not leap.
* ''Noxian Guillotine'' will not reset nor trigger {{ai|Hemorrhage 2|Darius|Noxian Might}} if used to kill a {{tip|clone}} or a target protected by {{tip|resurrection}}.
* ''Noxian Guillotine'' will reset but not trigger {{ai|Hemorrhage 2|Darius|Noxian Might}} if it finishes off a target that is in a {{tip|zombie state}}.
{{Unit-targeted cancel conditions}}

effects.str:
• True Damage: (+ 75% bonus AD)
  • Bonus Damage Per Stack: (+ 15% bonus AD)
  • Maximum True Damage: (+ 150% bonus AD)
